extraDescription: Project coordinator will support multiple projects under the Enterprise Projects and Process and Service Modernization Unit
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100003277 dated December 03, 2014. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
